translations: 雕刻（文字，图案）；铭刻在（记忆，脑海）中（be engraved on/in）

sentences.sentence: The shop will also engrave your child's name on the side.
sentences.translation: 商店也将在一侧刻上你孩子的名字。

sentences.sentence: It is difficult to engrave in marble.
He had the jeweler engrave his name on the back of the watch.
sentences.translation: 他请钟表匠把他的名字刻在手表的背面。
